channel.title: Comments on: Genesis Sleek Pro
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Susanta Sahoo
item.dc:creator: Susanta Sahoo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/genesis-sleek-pro/#comment-674">Nguyen Dat Tai</a>.
This theme is designed for blogging. Your requirements need a different theme altogether.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nguyen Dat Tai.

This theme is designed for blogging. Your requirements need a different theme altogether.

item.title: By: Nguyen Dat Tai
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Dat Tai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/genesis-sleek-pro/#comment-673">Susanta Sahoo</a>.
I want to show my product (image, car model, price) on home page. Example www.chevroletvietlong.com
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susanta Sahoo.

I want to show my product (image, car model, price) on home page.
Example http://www.chevroletvietlong.com

item.title: By: Nguyen Dat Tai
item.dc:creator: Nguyen Dat Tai
item.description:
Hi Susanta Sahoo,
Can i show 6 pages on home?
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Susanta Sahoo,

Can i show 6 pages on home?

Thanks!

item.title: By: Susanta Sahoo
item.dc:creator: Susanta Sahoo
item.description:
Thanks, Nick! This is not my first theme - I have already released two more themes but yes, this is the first time I have built a theme using Genesis Sample. So it's a personal achievement. :-)
However, I'd be happy if anyone could really find this theme useful for their project.
I'm planning to release more themes in future. Therefore, I really need them to try this out and suggest any areas of improvement if possible.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, Nick! This is not my first theme – I have already released two more themes but yes, this is the first time I have built a theme using Genesis Sample. So it’s a personal achievement. ðŸ™‚

However, I’d be happy if anyone could really find this theme useful for their project.

I’m planning to release more themes in future. Therefore, I really need them to try this out and suggest any areas of improvement if possible.

item.title: By: Nick Davis

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/genesis-sleek-pro/#comment-668">Susanta Sahoo</a>.
Thanks for sharing Susanta, is this your first theme release? Congrats!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susanta Sahoo.

Thanks for sharing Susanta, is this your first theme release? Congrats!

item.title: By: Susanta Sahoo
item.dc:creator: Susanta Sahoo
item.description: Built on Genesis Sample theme, Sleek Pro is great for personal blogging and/or news sites. I must mention that this theme is a Genesis-equivalent to and is inspired by Rowling them by Anders Noren. Hope folks like this theme and find it useful for their project. I'm planning to build many more child themes in the near future. So I really could use your advice! Cheers,
item.content:encoded: Built on Genesis Sample theme, Sleek Pro is great for personal blogging and/or news sites. I must mention that this theme is a Genesis-equivalent to and is inspired by Rowling them by Anders Noren. Hope folks like this theme and find it useful for their project. I’m planning to build many more child themes in the near future. So I really could use your advice! Cheers,
